name: Toy Bot Diaries Compilation
description:
Toy Bot is back and ready for triple the action! At long last, all three classic iPhone games are combined into one simple download.

Toy Bot Entry 1:
Tiny Toy Bot has awakened in a strange machine and now he needs your help! Use Toy Bot’s handy grappling hook and magnet boots to navigate him through different environments packed with puzzles and challenges!

Toy Bot Entry 2:
Toy Bot begins where he left off; climbing out of the dingy sewers and into a whole new world of challenges in the sky. Entry 2 gives you more levels, more content, more graphics and maximum fun!

Toy Bot Entry 3:
Hot on the trail of his enemy, Toy Bot sets a course much closer to home; Planet Bot. In order to confront his nemesis once and for all, our bite-sized hero must first traverse the expanses of space and befriend new allies. Time is running out to save Earth from War Bot's latest weapon, but, fortunately for us humans, Toy Bot still has a few tricks up his sleeve!


_________________________________________

THE TOY BOT SERIES HAS BEEN AWARDED:

"Best of" iPhone Games
www.toucharcade.com

Top 10 iPhone Games of 2008
www.pocketgamer.co.uk

Top 20 iPhone Games of 2008
www.bostonherald.com


* Be sure to grab IUGO's complete iPhone game selection which includes: Spy Bot Chronicles (sequel to Toy Bot), Shaky Summit, Zombie Attack!, Freeballin', Star Hogs, Zombie Attack! Second Wave, Toy Bot Mini Missions, Cliffed, Implode! and A.D.D.

Supported Languages: English, Français, Italiano, Deutsch, Español, 日本語, 中文.
